channel.title: Bluetooth PAN on KUBEDGE's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bluetooth PAN on KUBEDGE's Blog

item.title: Setting up PAN
item.description: This tutorial how to setup PAN on the slave pi to simulator LTE and eLTE RAN.

item.title: Setting up DHCPD on LTE & eLTE Node
item.description: This tutorial how to setup DHCPD and NAT so that the UE can access the internet through the AP & NAT running on LTE & eLTE simulating PI. This tutorial also describe how to setup the DHCPD to automatically allocated IPs to UE or PCs.
